snippet.title: Legends of Savvarah: Time of Pariah | Teaser
snippet.description:
New Game of the "Legends of Savvarah" series.

Add to wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2416500/Legends_of_Savvarah_Time_of_Pariah/?beta=0

Discord: https://discord.gg/meMGzrVsm5

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/SinovarST

Art by:
- https://www.furaffinity.net/user/bluekiwi101/
- https://www.furaffinity.net/user/moynzarek/
- Mila_Malina

Music by Vincienty

On the continent of Erteon, the endless war rages between Kradzhan – an alliance of three beastly kingdoms – and Dominion of the Horned Ones.

Seihal is a port city of Kradzhan, steeped in corruption and crime. Wealthy aristocrats, commanding squads of well-armed mercenaries, wield the ultimate power here.

Hidu is a mercenary. He once deserted the army, escaping death. He managed to blend into this colorful cauldron of the criminal world, where a precarious balance between different factions has somehow been maintained in recent years.

But now, this delicate balance is under threat: one by one, the enforcers of the Black Horn – a criminal authority for whom Hidu works – are disappearing.

Hidu must get to the bottom of these events. And perhaps even play a pivotal role in them, for a great storm is brewing...

FEATURES:
- A complex and truly nonlinear plot: 23 unique endings, numerous unexpected twists, and challenging decisions;
- 12 detailed non-playable characters, each can become either your friend or foe;
- 4 romantic interests (2 male and 2 female) featuring 18+ scenes (text and image);
- Vibrant and unique visual style, original soundtrack;
- A detailed, original fantasy world that goes beyond the game storyline;
- Space for role-play and your unique story: play as a ruthless rogue, a patriot of your country, or someone who just wants to survive. Everything is in your hands.
